英文法規名稱: Fee-charging Standards for census/survey data processing, site and facility usage provided by DGBAS, Executive Yuan
中文法規名稱: 行政院主計總處提供普（抽）查資料處理及場地設備使用收費標準
沿革內容:
1. Full text Promulgated on January 13, 2005 by the DGBAS, Executive Yuan Order Chu Ren Tsu No.0940000178A.
2. Amended & Promulgated on January 22, 2009 by the DGBAS, Executive Yuan Order Chu Ren Jiu Tsu No.0980000407A.
3. Amended & Promulgated on May 30, 2012 by the DGBAS, Executive Yuan Order Jiu Tong Fu Tsu No.1010300330A.
4. Amended & Promulgated on April 14, 2012 by the DGBAS, Executive Yuan Order Jiu Pu Guan Tsu No.1050400312A.

法規內容.條文內容: The Standards are enacted in accordance with Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.

The fees for census/survey data processing, site and facility usage are as follows:
1.The fees for census/survey data processing derived from specific demand of users are determined by the volume of data requested, based on the unit of megabyte. The fees will be NT$1,000 for less than 50 megabytes of data; NT$2,000 for 50 to less than 100 megabytes of data; NT$4,000 for 100 to less than 500 megabytes of data; and NT$5,000 for 500 megabytes of data and above. The aforementioned fees exclude saving media, and the data volume is determined separately for each census/survey data item.
2.For onsite data processing, the site and facility usage fees are added in addition to the data usage fees in the preceding article:
(1)The basic fee for site usage for each case will be NT$2,000.
(2)The fees for machine/equipment usage will be NT$200 per machine/equipment per day. Partial day will be counted as one day.

The fees for census/survey data processing, site and facility usage will be reduced according to the following provisions:
1.The fees for census/survey data processing will be reduced by 50% for schools or academic institutions in the needs of teaching or research.
2.The fees will be waived for government agencies or people ’ s representative bodies for official needs.
The Standards take effect on the date of promulgation.
